text: Rainbow Ruby (; ; pinyin: Cǎihóng bǎobǎo) is a 2016 Korean/Chinise/Canadian CGI animated television series aimed at children, produced by 38 °C Animation Studio and CJ E&M; Corporation in South Korea, China Entertainment Corporation (a subsidiary of China ACG Group, which is an enterprise directly under the PRC Government's Ministry of Culture) in China and DHX Media In Canada And Produced In Association With EBS 1 (South Korea) CCTV 1 (China) and Family Jr. (Canada) Category:2010s television series Category:2016 South Korean television series debuts Category:South Korean animated television series
title: Rainbow Ruby
